input_text:
Job Title: Client Executive Director

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Description

JOB SUMMARY:

Join our dynamic team as the D365 FSC Sales - Client Executive Director with a specialized focus on Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Supply Chain (D365 FSC). As a seasoned professional in this role, you will play a pivotal part in advancing the sales and expansion of D365 FSC consulting services within Argano's esteemed Microsoft Dynamics Practice. The Client Executive Director in Argano's Microsoft Practice is pivotal in supporting the sales and growth of Dynamics365 consulting services. This role demands an in-depth understanding of Microsoft Dynamics365 and the ability to align these services with client needs. The executive is responsible for developing new business opportunities, particularly in the Dynamics365 space, qualifying, and engaging potential clients in the consultative selling cycle, crafting tailored proposals, overseeing the contract process, and closing new business converting prospects into net new customers. The focus is on establishing and adding value through a team based consultative sales process solving client problems with appropriate strategy leveraging Dynamics 365 solutions to drive business transformation and growth for upper midmarket and enterprise clients.

Responsibilities

Initiate and lead sales opportunities for D365 FSC consulting services targeting Small and Medium-Sized Businesses (SMC) and Enterprise clients.Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the Microsoft Dynamics 365 FSC sphere.Cultivate and maintain key client relationships, ensuring satisfaction and alignment with D365 FSC solutions.Develop strategic sales plans specifically for D365 FSC services to meet revenue goals.Impart D365 FSC expertise and sales-focused mentorship to junior team members.Collaborate seamlessly with internal teams to tailor D365 FSC service offerings based on client feedback and evolving needs.Conduct comprehensive market research to uncover untapped opportunities within the D365 FSC ecosystem.Exceed sales targets related to D365 FSC consulting services through strategic planning and execution.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to craft compelling D365 FSC focused proposals and presentations.

Education

Minimum and/or Preferred Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, Accounting, or related field, required.MBA or relevant master's degree, with a focus on technology or business management preferred.Preferred: Microsoft Dynamics 365 FSC certifications.

Experience

5 to 8 years of experience in client service or sales, with a distinct focus on Microsoft Dynamics 365 FSC or similar ERP solutions.Proven track record in successfully selling and implementing D365 FSC solutions.Experience in a lead role within a team-selling environment.Strong negotiation and communication skills, particularly in consulting and technology contexts.

Skill Requirements

Sales Acumen: Demonstrate an exceptional ability to not only meet but exceed targets in the D365 FSC domain.Dynamics 365 FSC Knowledge: Showcase a profound understanding of Microsoft Dynamics 365 FSC capabilities and their application in various business contexts.Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and execute strategic plans revolving around D365 FSC services.Communication Skills: Exhibit exceptional skills in articulating the value of D365 FSC solutions to a diverse client base.

About Us

Argano is the first of its kind: a digital consultancy totally immersed in high-performance operations. We steward enterprises through ever-evolving markets, empowering them with transformative strategies and technologies to exceed customer expectations, unlock commercial innovation, and drive optimal efficiency and growth.

Argano is an equal-opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran status, or disability status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
